Text: You are a god! Thank you.
You should see if you could find the transformers ongoing series IDW had before it branched into the two series currently publishing!

Transformers Ongoing would be great if you could manage it. I actually have most of those already. I'm missing about 5 issues plus "The Death of Optimus Prime" numbered as issue 125 for some reason. We all know he wont stay dead of course.
